author: Mark Prigg For Dailymail.Com
title: Apple spaceship HQ open in April with Steve Jobs theater | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad The spaceship is almost ready! Staff to move into new 'Apple Park' HQ in April as firm reveals on-site theater will be named after Steve Jobs Building was the brainchild of Steve Jobs, who came up with the design months before his death in 2011 It features the world's largest piece of curved glass and will be surrounded by thousands of trees Will take six months to move all staff into the $5 billion (Â£4 billion) 2.8 million-square-foot campus
